title: John Day Fossil Beds National Monument: Park History
body: Park History       Fossil Flora of the John Day Basin Oregon (1902) Geology and Paleoenvironments of the Clarno Unit: John Day Fossil Beds National Monument (1994) Historic Resource Study (2000) John Day Fossil Beds: A Study (Preliminary) (1967) John Day Fossil Bed Final Wild and Scenic River Study (1979) (pdf) John Day Fossil Beds National Monument: Museum Management Plan (2008) Floating in the Stream of Time - An Administrative History (1996)
